body: Since Qss/Mercurial Scimitar {{item:3139}} {{item:3140}} got nerfed by taking away the "remove all debuffs"enchantment, zed and some other champions ({{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:8}}etc.) got a i wouldnt say a  **MEGA** buff but a very noticeable buff.What are some ways the community (you guys) can think of ways to balance this ~~mofo. ~~

replies.body:
this is so true since if we don't ban zed{{champion:238}} , our ADC dies 100% in the team fight{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} .
Since zed players are not moronic{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} , they won't use their ulti on tank or mid champs who have zhonyas{{item:3157}} . 

As he said GA{{item:3026}}  is not the one we are wanting to have. We don't need cleanse{{summoner:1}}  or magic resist neither{{item:3140}} {{item:3139}} . What we want is more chance to do dmg on the opponents by surviving for extra 2 to 5 seconds.

Banshee's{{item:3102}}  is not for adc as well. maybe except for Corki{{champion:42}} .

About "position better" part, well, I would say it is not the absolute truth, since even 'pray' just dies when he got sandwiched or focused.
In addition, we are not talking about pros, since they are way different from the usual.

Well, I'm whining. I admit it.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}  But still, QSS nerf is ridiculous and should be reversed.

Phy whinge video, seems par for course of the rest of his videos.

I like how he is trying to defend the meta we just had with ADC's being in every role.

And then even goes to "The pro's don't need this but plebs do" which is a terrible argument towards a balance team that actually balance's more towards the Pro's then the plebs.
